drupalNodeEvent.title: Shanghai's Contemporary Art (WildChina On The Ground Episode 3)

field_speakers.processed: Yan Fang (curator at UCCA Edge), Florence Ma (WildChina Shanghai guide), Mei Zhang (WildChina founder)

field_description.processed: Join us as we meet WildChina guide, Flo Ma, at one of Shanghai‘s newest art museums, UCCA Edge. After getting oriented on where we are in the city, we’ll then head inside with an exclusive tour of the exhibition “Liu Xiaodong: Your Friends” led by UCCA curator Yan Fang.
